name: @malvineous/opl
description: Yamaha OPL2/3 FM synth chip emulator

scripts.build: emcc --bind -std=c++11 -O3 -I src -o lib/opl.js -s SINGLE_FILE -Wno-switch -s EXPORT_NAME="opl" -s INVOKE_RUN=0 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s FILESYSTEM=0 -s NODEJS_CATCH_EXIT=0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=0 -s TOTAL_STACK=8192 -s TOTAL_MEMORY=65536 src/dbopl.cpp src/index.cpp

author: Adam Nielsen <malvineous@shikadi.net>
